DOC.brief_title: 3D Ultrasonography Fetal Lung Volume Measurement Neonatal Respiratory Function
DOC.detailed_description: One hundred healthy woman singleton pregnancy present 1st stage labour beincluded study . Participants divide two group ; Group A ( n : 50 - woman pregnant ± 34-37 week gestation ) & Group B ( n : 50 - woman pregnant ± 37+1-40 week gestation ) . Gestational age ( GA ) establish menstrual date confirm obstetric ultrasound . For group , full history take include receive antenatal steroid follow general , abdominal & pelvic examination confirm stage labour & exclude presence rupture membrane . Obstetric ultrasound do confirm GA , assess amniotic fluid index ( AFI ) & exclude fetal anomaly . Fetal lung volume ( FLV ) measure use Voluson 730 Expert ultrasonography machine ( GE Healthcare Austria GmbH , Seoul , Korea ) equip 4- 8- MHz transabdominal transducer 3-dimensional ( 3D ) volume scan . A single examiner perform ultrasound examination follow technique ; transverse section fetal thorax level 4-chamber view , fetal heart proximal transducer , identify 2-dimensional ultrasonography , volume box adjust scan entire fetal thorax . The maximum resolution adjust . The angle volume sample vary throughout gestational age maximum limit 75° third trimester . After scan volume , multiplanar image 3 orthogonal ultrasonographic section analyze reconstruct 3D ultrasound image . Before volume analyze , lung carefully identify 3 orthogonal multiplanar image section . The investigator use rotational technique entail VOCAL image program measure lung volume . A transverse section multiplanar image choose reference image volume analysis ( Figure 1 ) . Right lung volume measure series area trace study lung serial rotation 30° ( 6 time ; Figures 2 3 ) . Reviewing parallel slice execute whole lung 3 perpendicular plane allow u check adequacy rotational area trace approach . Right lung volume automatically measure plot gestational age , take 2 minute estimate lung volume . After child birth , neonatal respiratory function assess use APGAR score ( 1 , 5 10 min ) together occurrence RDS need neonatal ICU admission respiratory support measurement .
DOC.criteria: One hundred healthy woman singleton pregnancy present 1st stage labour include study . Participants divide two group ; Group A ( n : 50 woman pregnant ± 3437 week gestation ) & Group B ( n : 50 woman pregnant ± 37+140 week gestation ) . Gestational age ( GA ) establish menstrual date confirm obstetric ultrasound Exclusion criterion include maternal administration respiratory depressant within 2 hour delivery fetus ( e. g. , opioid analgesic & general anesthesia upon CS ) oligohydramnios ( amniotic fluid index < 5th centile ) , rupture membrane , presence fetal malformation ( chest , heart abdominal ) abnormal fetal growth ( define : estimate fetal weight < 5th centile > 95th centile and/or abdominal circumference < 5th centile > 95th centile ) . Also , woman cardiac pacemaker exclude ( transmitter necessary lung volume measurement could disturb function pacemaker ) .
